note: Benard Onyango is the founder and CEO of West Kenya Real Estate, a leading property letting, development and management company with all-in-one asset operations and management platform. In his role, Benard is responsible for creating and implementing business strategies, managing the company’s investments and resources, as well as driving West Kenya Real Estate’s future innovation and growth.
